SELECT a.*, b.lastSectionCode, c.title AS lastSectionTitle FROM tb_novel a LEFT JOIN (SELECT max(code) AS lastSectionCode, novel_code FROM tb_section GROUP BY novel_code) b ON a.code = b.novel_code LEFT JOIN tb_section c ON c.code = b.lastSectionCode WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND ( a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR a.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ) ORDER BY a.code ASC
